meanings.definition: The area near or surrounding a particular place.
meanings.sent1: The vicinage around the park was filled with colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: The vicinage of the school was bustling with students during lunchtime.
meanings.sent3: The vicinage near the ice cream shop always seemed to smell like waffle cones.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the vicinage of the beach turned into a canvas of orange and pink hues.
meanings.sent5: The vicinage of the forest echoed with the chirping of birds and rustling of leaves.

meanings.definition: A group of neighboring or nearby people or things.
meanings.sent1: The vicinage of friendly neighbors often gathered for weekend barbecues.
meanings.sent2: In the vicinage of the market, vendors displayed their fresh produce.
meanings.sent3: The vicinage of playful puppies always brought joy to the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The vicinage of stars in the night sky seemed to twinkle in harmony.
meanings.sent5: The vicinage of books on the shelf invited readers to explore new worlds.
